    • Method Detail

      • gauss

        public static <S extends NumericType<S>,T extends NumericType<T>> void gauss(double sigma,
                                                                             RandomAccessible<S> source,
                                                                             RandomAccessibleInterval<T> target)
                                                                      throws IncompatibleTypeException
        Apply Gaussian convolution to source and write the result to output. In-place operation (source==target) is supported.

        If the target type T is DoubleType, all calculations are done in double precision. For all other target RealTypes float precision is used. General NumericTypes are computed in their own precision. The source type S and target type T are either both RealTypes or both the same type.

        Type Parameters:
        S - source type
        T - target type
        Parameters:
        sigma - standard deviation of isotropic Gaussian.
        source - source image, must be sufficiently padded (e.g. Views.extendMirrorSingle(RandomAccessibleInterval)) to provide values for the target interval plus a border of half the kernel size.
        target - target image
        Throws:
        IncompatibleTypeException - if source and target type are not compatible (they must be either both RealTypes or the same type).

      • gauss

        public static <S extends NumericType<S>,T extends NumericType<T>> void gauss(double[] sigma,
                                                                             RandomAccessible<S> source,
                                                                             RandomAccessibleInterval<T> target)
                                                                      throws IncompatibleTypeException
        Apply Gaussian convolution to source and write the result to output. In-place operation (source==target) is supported.

        If the target type T is DoubleType, all calculations are done in double precision. For all other target RealTypes float precision is used. General NumericTypes are computed in their own precision. The source type S and target type T are either both RealTypes or both the same type.

        Computation is multi-threaded with as many threads as processors available.

        Type Parameters:
        S - source type
        T - target type
        Parameters:
        sigma - standard deviation in every dimension.
        source - source image, must be sufficiently padded (e.g. Views.extendMirrorSingle(RandomAccessibleInterval)) to provide values for the target interval plus a border of half the kernel size.
        target - target image
        Throws:
        IncompatibleTypeException - if source and target type are not compatible (they must be either both RealTypes or the same type).

      • gauss

        public static <S extends NumericType<S>,T extends NumericType<T>> void gauss(double[] sigma,
                                                                             RandomAccessible<S> source,
                                                                             RandomAccessibleInterval<T> target,
                                                                             int numThreads)
                                                                      throws IncompatibleTypeException
        Apply Gaussian convolution to source and write the result to output. In-place operation (source==target) is supported.

        If the target type T is DoubleType, all calculations are done in double precision. For all other target RealTypes float precision is used. General NumericTypes are computed in their own precision. The source type S and target type T are either both RealTypes or both the same type.

        Type Parameters:
        S - source type
        T - target type
        Parameters:
        sigma - standard deviation in every dimension.
        source - source image, must be sufficiently padded (e.g. Views.extendMirrorSingle(RandomAccessibleInterval)) to provide values for the target interval plus a border of half the kernel size.
        target - target image
        numThreads - how many threads to use for the computation.
        Throws:
        IncompatibleTypeException - if source and target type are not compatible (they must be either both RealTypes or the same type).

      • gauss

        public static <S extends NumericType<S>,T extends NumericType<T>> void gauss(double[] sigma,
                                                                             RandomAccessible<S> source,
                                                                             RandomAccessibleInterval<T> target,
                                                                             ExecutorService service)
                                                                      throws IncompatibleTypeException
        Apply Gaussian convolution to source and write the result to output. In-place operation (source==target) is supported.

        If the target type T is DoubleType, all calculations are done in double precision. For all other target RealTypes float precision is used. General NumericTypes are computed in their own precision. The source type S and target type T are either both RealTypes or both the same type.

        Type Parameters:
        S - source type
        T - target type
        Parameters:
        sigma - standard deviation in every dimension.
        source - source image, must be sufficiently padded (e.g. Views.extendMirrorSingle(RandomAccessibleInterval)) to provide values for the target interval plus a border of half the kernel size.
        target - target image
        service - service providing threads for multi-threading
        Throws:
        IncompatibleTypeException - if source and target type are not compatible (they must be either both RealTypes or the same type).
